name: happner-client
description: The client for happner-2 and happner cluster services

scripts.coverage: npm run test-cover && npm run report
scripts.coveralls: npm run test-cover && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.release: rm -rf node_modules && rm -f package-lock.json && npm install && npm run test-cover && npm run test-browser
scripts.test: npm run lint && mocha test/unit/* test/integration/* --opts mocha.opts
scripts.test-cover: env LOG_LEVEL=off nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text-summary mocha test/unit/* test/integration/* --opts mocha.opts
